scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.preversion: git fetch --prune --prune-tags && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: export version=v$(node -p -e 'require(`./package.json`).version') && export app_version=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f2-).0 && yq e -i '.version=strenv(version)' ./wrongsecrets-ctf-party/Chart.yaml && yq e -i '.appVersion=strenv(app_version)' ./wrongsecrets-ctf-party/Chart.yaml && git add .
